resources.string:
This application implements the last five mini projects from Coursera class "An Introduction to Interactive Programming in Python by Joe Warren, John Greiner, Stephen Wong, Scott Rixner", these five mini projects are
"stopwatch" - A reflex testing game,
"Blackjack" - A simple implementation of blackjack,
"Memory" - A simple implementaion of classic memory game,
"Pong" - Classic pong implementation and
"RiceRocks" - 'Asteroids' implementation
